text: Yeah, I was in the boy scouts at the time. And we was doing the 50-yard dash, racing, but we was at the pier, marked off, and so we was doing the 50-yard dash. There was about 8 or 9 of us, you know, going down, coming back.
keypoint: Owen's contemplative moment by the fire is interrupted

text: And, going down the third time, I caught cramps and I started yelling "Help!", but the fellows didn't believe me, you know. They thought I was just trying to catch up, because I was going on or slowing down. So all of them kept going.
keypoint: A false alarm leads to relief as Owen identifies the source
